member.name: M:HomePage2.modDBFunctions.GetLastRecord(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection@,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This function returns the last integer ID in a table from the DB
member.param: An oledb connection object
The table in the DB from which to retrieve the last ID value
The column name in the table which contains the ID fields
member.returns: An integer value which is the last ID value

member.name: M:HomePage2.modDBFunctions.GetFirstRecord(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection@,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This function returns the first integer ID in a table from the DB
member.param: An oledb connection object
The table in the DB from which to retrieve the first ID value
The column name in the table which contains the ID fields
member.returns: An integer value which is the first ID value

member.name: M:HomePage2.modDBFunctions.FindDataRow(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection@,System.String,System.String,System.Data.DataTable,System.Boolean)
member.summary: The function Searches for a value in the specified column in the datatable This is the original version of this function. This version is left for backward compatibility
member.param: An oledb connection object
The value to search for the DB
The Column name in which the value is to be searched
The datatable in which to search for the values specified.
A true/false value indicating whether the passes in value needs to be trimmed or not.
member.returns: A datarow that contains the value being searched.

member.name: M:HomePage2.modDBFunctions.FindDataRow(System.String,System.String,System.Data.DataTable,System.Boolean)
member.summary: The function Searches for a value in the specified column in the datatable This overload corrects the problem with the original function (above): This version is left for backward compatibility
member.param: The value to search for the DB
The Column name in which the value is to be searched
The datatable in which to search for the values specified.
A true/false value indicating whether the passes in value needs to be trimmed or not.
member.returns: A datarow that contains the value being searched.

member.name: M:HomePage2.modDBFunctions.DeleteDataRows(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection@,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Deletes rows from the database table. Constructs the SQL from parameters. Id field can be string or integer. Will delete all rows with specified criteria so needs to be used with caution.

param.name: strTableName
param.para: A valid table name for the data source

param.name: strIdField
param.para: A fieldname for specifying the criteria

param.name: strIdValue
param.para: the value of the specified field

param.name: blAsInteger
param.para: indicates if the specified field is numeric or integer for building the sql string

member.returns: An integer value specifying the number of records deleted

member.name: M:HomePage2.modDBFunctions.DeleteDataRows(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection@,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Uses the function above to create a sql statement from the passed values and executes the SQL Statement. Delete all records in a table meeting the criteria
member.param: An oledb connection object
The table name from which to delete the row.
The name of the ID column in the table
True/false value indicating whether the ID is an integer or not
The value of the Id of which the row to delete.
Used to get the context in which a specific user carried out certain actions

member.name: M:HomePage2.modDBFunctions.DeleteDataRows(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection@,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a SQL Statement from parametres passed and executes the statement Delete all records in a table meeting the criteria
member.param: An oledb connection object
The table name from which to delete the row.
The name of the ID column in the table
The value of the Id of which the row to delete.
member.returns: An integer value of the number of rows affected by the execution.

member.name: M:HomePage2.modDBFunctions.DBConnectionProvider(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection)
member.summary: The function determines the OleDBConnectionProvider from the Oledb object.
member.param: The oledb coneection of which the provider must be determined.
member.returns: An integer value indicating what provider is attached to the oledb connection

member.name: M:HomePage2.modDBFunctions.DBConnectionProvider(System.String)
member.summary: The function determines the OleDBConnectionProvider from the connection string supplied Gets the Oledb connection object from the connection string and uses the function above to determine the provider
member.param: The connection string of which the provider must be determined.
member.returns: An integer value indicating what provider is attached to the connection string

member.name: M:HomePage2.modDBFunctions.DBFormat(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection,System.Object)
member.summary: The function Opens the connection if it is not. Determines what connection provider is attached to the connection object Formats the object into a format that is either SQL-friendly or access-query-friendly depending on the connection provider if SQL provider - uses sqlformat else uses AccessFormat
member.param: The connection object of which to get the connection provider
The object value to be formatted in a DB friendly string
member.returns: A string value that can be used in either Access Query or a SQL statement

member.name: M:HomePage2.modDBFunctions.DBFormat(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: The function gets the connection object from the connection string supplied Then uses the function above to format the object supplied
member.param: The connection string of which to get the connection string
The object value to be formatted in a DB friendly string
member.returns: A string value that can be used in either Access Query or a SQL statement

member.summary: The function gets a datatable from the supplied datatable with distinct value of the strFieldNames
member.param: The datatble from which to get a datatable with distinct values
The field names of which to get the distinct values in the datatable.
member.returns: A datatable with distinct values of the fields; strFieldnames

member.name: M:HomePage2.modDBFunctions.DataRowValuesAreEqual(System.Object[],System.Data.DataRow,System.String[])
member.summary: The function checks if values in columns(specified) of a datarow are the same.
member.param: The datarow in which to check for duplicate values
The names of columns in which to check for duplicates.
member.returns: A true/false indicating if values in 2 columns(specified) of the datarow are the same.

member.name: M:HomePage2.modDBFunctions.CopyDataRowValues(System.Data.DataRow,System.Data.DataRow,System.String[])
member.summary: The function Copies datarow values from the source datarow to the destination (for specified column names only) Note, the datarows need to have the same structure or this function will fail
member.param: The datarow from which the values are to be copied to the destination (for specified column names only)
The final datarow with the values (for specified column names only) of the source datarow values
The names of the columns for which the values are to be copied to the destination row.
member.returns: The destination row with the copied values
